channel.title: BBC News
channel.description: Feed from BBC News - with images and summaries

item.title: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
item.description:
Four men expose the horror and brutality of conditions in the Ukraine war, with two saying they saw soldiers being shot for refusing orders.

item.title: 'Anyone who runs is shot': Watch Russian soldiers describe killings of troops who refuse orders
item.description:
The men, who are on the run, told of the horrors they witnessed on the Russian side of the front lines in Ukraine.
